sentence.Network_en: Each nation has its own peculiarities when it comes to doing business.
sentence.Network_cn: 谈到做生意，各国都有其独特之处。

sentence.Network_en: the cultural peculiarities of the English
He used to mimic speech peculiarities of another.
sentence.Network_cn: 他过去总是模仿别人讲话的特点.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I will do no more to enact the peculiarities of life ., 我不会再去表演生活中的奇特之处.
The peculiarities do not end there ., 怪异之处还不止这一点.
peculiarities 特殊性, peculiarities 特色风貌, peculiarities 特色
Closer inspection , however , reveals a few peculiarities ., 但是 , 仔细瞧瞧你就会发现一些特别之处.

list.abs: peculiar什... ... be peculiar to 为...所独有的 peculiar people 上帝的特选子民 the peculiar institution 特殊制度,黑奴制度.
特殊星系特殊星系(peculiar galaxy)是指形态和结构不同于哈勃分类中正常星系的河外星系。这一类星系的特殊性质主要是因星系核的活动和主星系同伴星系之间的相互扰动.
psychological orientation 心理定向psychological peculiarity 心理特征psychological phenomenology 心理现象学
peculiar minor planet 奇特小行星peculiar motion 本动pedestal 台

entry.def: A peculiarity that someone or something has is a strange or unusual characteristic or habit.

example.ex: Joe's other peculiarity was that he was constantly munching hard candy.
example.tran: 乔还有一个怪癖，就是喜欢不停地嚼硬糖。

entry.def: A peculiarity is a characteristic or quality which belongs or relates only to one person or thing.

example.ex: Each nation can have its own peculiarities when it comes to doing business.
example.tran: 每个民族做生意时都有自己的特色。

auth_sentence.content: Gotten to know the town and its peculiarities really well.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gotten to know the town and its peculiarities really well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gotten to know the town and its peculiarities really well.

auth_sentence.content: Touring brings out the peculiarities in you.
auth_sentence.res_content: Touring brings out the peculiarities in you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Touring brings out the peculiarities in you.

auth_sentence.content: These peculiarities may foster eccentric behaviors but do not necessarily create incompetence.
auth_sentence.res_content: These peculiarities may foster eccentric behaviors but do not necessarily create incompetence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These peculiarities may foster eccentric behaviors but do not necessarily create incompetence.
